TEXT.TITLE: STERLING SOFTWARE <SSW> BUYS BACK SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Sterling Software Inc said it has bought back 394,100 shares of its stock in the open market since October 8. "In a market full of sellers we're a confident buyer and we'll continue purchasing shares," president Sterling Williams said. Reuter
